identity.name: Anjuman-e-Bagh-e-Zehra
identity.brand_essence: A bridge between tradition and community support, using modern transparency to build trust.

heading_styles.h1: font-cinzel text-5xl md:text-7xl font-bold tracking-tight text-gold-400
heading_styles.h2: font-cinzel text-4xl md:text-5xl font-semibold tracking-tight text-gold-300
heading_styles.h3: font-cinzel text-2xl md:text-3xl font-medium tracking-wide text-gold-200

secondary.desc: Maroon - Use for emotional highlights or 'Tragedy' contexts

accent.desc: Deep Green - Use for 'Success' states or 'Community' sections

buttons.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-yellow-700 to-yellow-600 hover:from-yellow-600 hover:to-yellow-500 text-white font-cinzel tracking-widest uppercase text-sm px-8 py-3 rounded-sm shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(212,175,55,0.3)] transition-all duration-300 border border-yellow-400/20
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-yellow-600/50 text-yellow-500 hover:bg-yellow-900/20 font-cinzel tracking-widest uppercase text-sm px-8 py-3 rounded-sm transition-all duration-300

cards.feature: group relative overflow-hidden bg-white/5 border border-white/10 p-8 hover:border-yellow-500/30 transition-all duration-500
cards.plan: flex flex-col bg-gradient-to-b from-gray-900 to-black border border-yellow-600/20 p-8 rounded-lg hover:transform hover:-translate-y-2 transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-[0_10px_40px_-10px_rgba(212,175,55,0.15)] relative

inputs.default: bg-black/50 border-white/10 text-white placeholder:text-gray-600 focus:border-yellow-600/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-yellow-600/50 transition-all duration-200

entrance.fade_up: animate-in fade-in slide-in-from-bottom-8 duration-700 ease-out fill-mode-forwards

assets.icons: Lucide React (default) or Phosphor Icons (Gold weight)

universal_guidelines: Dark Mode Only: The spiritual theme relies on shadows and light. Do not implement a light mode toggle unless strictly necessary for accessibility.
Gold is Sacred: Use gold sparingly. It represents divinity and importance. Do not overuse it for trivial borders.
Respectful Spacing: Religious texts and content need breathing room. Use 'relaxed' leading and generous padding.
Data Privacy: For the dashboard, ensure no sensitive donor info is visible in 'public' demo modes.
Borders over Backgrounds: Prefer transparent backgrounds with subtle 1px borders over solid gray blocks. It feels more 'ethereal'.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'Cinzel' and 'Manrope' fonts via Google Fonts immediately. 2. Configure Tailwind with the custom 'gold' and 'maroon' colors defined in the palette. 3. Build the Landing Page first to establish the visual language. 4. Use Shadcn for the Dashboard but override the default 'slate' styles with the custom 'zinc/black' and 'gold' theme.
